pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Rose Hip Oil Elixir 80ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Extra Care ROSE HIP OIL ELIIXR is a lightweight oil for normal to damaged hair for lightweight repair.

EXTRA CARE ROSE HIP OIL ELIXIR offers:
+ LIGHTWEIGHT REPAIR
+ LONG-LASTING ROSE SCENT
+ SUPPLENESS AND SILKY FINISH

Made in Australia
100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Suitable For: Normal To Damaged Hair

Size: 80mL

Scent: Rose

Hair Type: Normal To Damaged Hair

KEY FEATURES

• Lightweight Repair
• 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Warnings

Keep bottle out of direct sunlight. Keep out of reach of children.

FLAMMABLE WARNING

No

Ingredients

Cyclomethicone · Dimethiconol · Phenyl Trimethicone · Rosa Canina Fruit Oil · Tocopherol · Parfum (Fragrance)

Directions

1. Use on towel-dried hair for PROTECTION, INDULGENT
NOURISHMENT and improved MANAGEABILITY
2. Use on dry hair for LONG LASTING MOISTURE
Apply 1-2 pumps onto the mid lengths and ends of the
hair. Leave In. Suitable for daily use.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle is Kerbside Recyclable. Pump & Cap can be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 1 PET(E)
